section.title: Why This Matters for Cerberus
section.p: Cerberus is a Boxer–German Shepherd mix. Understanding these breeds’ general characteristics can help adopters prepare for his high energy, intelligence, and need for structured activity. Individual personality and history will vary, so use this as general context only.
